description:
• This course is a compilation of hundreds of Swift code solutions neatly organized in sections for fast reference when you need it. Each lecture will highlight example code in a brief video, and demonstrate how to use it correctly, as well as best practices for its implementation.

• Each lecture is downloadable so you can create your own Swift docs if you want.

• Anyone who writes Swift code needs this library in their coding toolbox for fast reference and usage. 

• Please note: This Swift Cookbook course will not teach you the Swift language, or how to code, You should already have completed Paul Hudson's Swift tutorials at HackingWithSwift.com, or the Swift Mastery Course, or have written your own existing Swift apps.

• This is an ever growing Swift library with more example code being added on a regular basis. 

• Featuring example code by the award winning Swift programmer Paul Hudson.

• What the Apple Docs should be.
title: The Swift Cookbook of Code
